name: The Big Bang Puzzle Pro HD
name_original: The Big Bang Puzzle Pro HD
description:
The Big Bang Puzzle HD is a simple puzzle game。In this game you have to move other blocks away and move the red block to exit grid. Vertical blocks can move only up and down. Horizontal blocks can move only left and right.
There are 5 difficult levels of the game, from Easy to Crazy , 8370+ levels in total , the challenge awaits you!

Features:
1. 5 difficult levels of the game, from Easy to Crazy.
2. 8370+ levels in total.
3. Game themes。
4. Rating system.
5. undo system.
6. Game playback system.
7. Puzzle hint.
